com.google.android.exoplayer.upstream.cache

Class CacheDataSink

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.upstream.cache.CacheDataSink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSink

    public final class CacheDataSink
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataSink
    Writes data into a cache.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CacheDataSink

        public CacheDataSink(Cache cache,
                     long maxCacheFileSize)
        Parameters:
        cache - The cache into which data should be written.
        maxCacheFileSize - The maximum size of a cache file, in bytes. If the sink is opened for a DataSpec whose size exceeds this value, then the data will be fragmented into multiple cache files.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public DataSink open(DataSpec dataSpec)
              throws CacheDataSink.CacheDataSinkException
        Description copied from interface: DataSink
        Opens the DataSink to consume the specified data. Calls to DataSink.open(DataSpec) and DataSink.close() must be balanced.
        Specified by:
        open in interface DataSink
        Parameters:
        dataSpec - Defines the data to be consumed.
        Returns:
        This DataSink, for convenience.
        Throws:
        CacheDataSink.CacheDataSinkException
